lead_paragraph: WEINBERG--Leonard, of New York, NY passed away on January 18, 2016 at the age of 80. Beloved husband of Samari (nee Cabigas) for 35 years; devoted father to Sebastian (Rosa), Fabiana, Kenneth (Ellen) and Melissa (William); proud grandfather of seven. Former President of Grenoble Mills, Inc., later found his calling as a teacher at Edward A. Reynolds West Side High School before co- founding Hands On! A Musical Experience, Inc. with his wife. He left an impression. Donations may be sent to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. 1/3
